events.message: We have successfully received your software engineer application for the backend developer role in our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department as a software developer candidate.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was completed and the feedback was very positive regarding your software development experience.
Thank you for promptly providing your availability for the upcoming technical interview, showing enthusiasm for the engineering role.
Your technical interview with the senior engineering panel has been scheduled for next week as discussed.
Congratulations, you have successfully completed the technical interview with excellent problem-solving skills demonstrated.
An HR interview has been arranged to discuss your fit within our company culture and review compensation details.
The HR interview was completed and feedback indicates a strong alignment with company values and expectations.
We are pleased to present you with an offer for the software engineering position, reflecting your skills and experience.
You have responded positively to the offer details, expressing excitement to join our engineering team.
The candidate has formally accepted the offer for the software engineer role, confirming the start date soon.
Welcome aboard! The onboarding process has begun, including introductions and setup for your engineering work environment.
The hiring process is now complete. The new engineer is fully onboarded and integrated into the development team.
